channel.title: [508 Bulby] npc help [bulby]
channel.description: `I need to know how to change this, Its really confusing me, would anyone of you mopar community people know how to do this? Thanks alot for taking the time to help out a fellow noob with this coding crap!! My npc looks North/West but i want it t look South ! :P i don't know how to change this..

item.title: [508 Bulby] npc help [bulby]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:417812”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=520358.msg3779554#msg3779554 date=1318356283]

Change the “face direction” flag to whatever the value is for south (0 I believe)
[/quote]He can’t, bulby doesn’t have that flag in the update block, so he’ll have to add it and some methods before he can do what he wants

How does he not have that flag in the update block? It’s default in the 317 protocol.[/quote]You think every flag is set and sent every time the update block is called? No, you need to SET the flags (which tells the client what data is coming through, like little small packets), then send the data. Bulby base doesn’t have the flag methods in there, so it’s never sent.

Read full topic

[/quote]He can’t, bulby doesn’t have that flag in the update block, so he’ll have to add it and some methods before he can do what he wants[/quote]

How does he not have that flag in the update block? It’s default in the 317 protocol.

Read full topic

item.title: [508 Bulby] npc help [bulby]
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

Davidi2:

You need to add the NPC face coords stuff, which def isn’t in the old bulby stuff.

I don’t understand what you mean, sorry im not very good at this stuff, im learning! Starting to like this stuff but every once in awhile i get stuck i got started with fixing specials from my friend in real life showing me, so all i know is spec’s and the basic stuff like changing home adding npc making shops (Don’t know how to add stuff to the shops but ill get there) Not that great of a designer but working on it!! Thanks though davidi you always very helpful!

Read full topic
